Package StyleSheets.BaseComponents

Class AtRule.Builder<T extends AtRule.Builder<T>>

java.lang.Object
StyleSheets.BaseComponents.AtRule.Builder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - generic builder
Direct Known Subclasses:
Animation.Builder
Enclosing class:
AtRule
public static class AtRule.Builder<T extends AtRule.Builder<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
The builder class for the at-rule. It is an inner static class used to build an immutable instance of an AtRule object.

    • Builder

      public Builder​(AtRuleType type)
      Constructor for at-rule builder. This overload only allows type specification.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of at-rule expressed with the AtRuleType enum

    • Builder

      public Builder​(AtRuleType type, java.lang.String rule)
      Constructor for at-rule builder. This overload only allows type specification.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of at-rule expressed with the AtRuleType enum
      rule - the rule followed up after the at-rule type

  • Method Details

    • addRuleSet

      public T addRuleSet​(RuleSet ruleSet)
      Adds a rule set to be nested in the at-rule.
      Parameters:
      ruleSet - the rule set which will be added to the list of rule sets
      Returns:
      builder of generic type for at-rules

    • addRule

      public T addRule​(java.lang.String css)
      Adds a rule to be nested in the at-rule. This overload takes pure CSS as the argument and adds it to the list of rules.
      Parameters:
      css - the rule which will be added to the list of rules
      Returns:
      builder of generic type for at-rules

    • addRule

      public T addRule​(Property property, java.lang.String value)
      Adds a rule to be nested in the at-rule. This overload takes a property and a value as arguments and adds it to the list of rules.
      Parameters:
      property - the property via Property enum
      value - the value as a String
      Returns:
      builder of generic type for at-rules

    • addRule

      public T addRule​(Property property, Color color)
      Adds a rule to be nested in the at-rule. This overload takes a property and a color as arguments and adds it to the list of rules.
      Parameters:
      property - the property via Property enum
      color - the color via Color enum
      Returns:
      builder of generic type for at-rules

    • build

      public AtRule build()
      Builds the at-rule and returns it.
      Returns:
      AtRule constructed by the builder
